com.google.gcloud.storage.testing

Class RemoteGcsHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gcloud.storage.testing.RemoteGcsHelper

  • public class RemoteGcsHelper
extends Object
    Utility to create a remote storage configuration for testing

    • Method Detail

      • options

        public StorageOptions options()
        Returns a StorageOptions object to be used for testing.

      • forceDelete

        public static Boolean forceDelete(Storage storage,
                  String bucket,
                  long timeout,
                  TimeUnit unit)
                           throws InterruptedException,
                                  ExecutionException
        Deletes a bucket, even if non-empty. Objects in the bucket are listed and deleted until bucket deletion succeeds or timeout expires.
        Parameters:
        storage - the storage service to be used to issue requests
        bucket - the bucket to be deleted
        timeout - the maximum time to wait
        unit - the time unit of the timeout argument
        Returns:
        true if deletion succeeded, false if timeout expired.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException - if the thread deleting the bucket is interrupted while waiting
        ExecutionException - if an exception was thrown while deleting bucket or bucket objects

      • generateBucketName

        public static String generateBucketName()
        Returns a bucket name generated using a random UUID.

      • create

        public static RemoteGcsHelper create(String projectId,
                     String keyPath,
                     RemoteGcsHelper.Option... options)
                              throws RemoteGcsHelper.GcsHelperException
        Creates a RemoteGcsHelper object for the given project id and JSON key path.
        Parameters:
        projectId - id of the project to be used for running the tests
        keyPath - path to the JSON key to be used for running the tests
        options - creation options
        Returns:
        A RemoteGcsHelper object for the provided options.
        Throws:
        RemoteGcsHelper.GcsHelperException - if the file pointed by keyPath does not exist

      • create

        public static RemoteGcsHelper create(RemoteGcsHelper.Option... options)
                              throws RemoteGcsHelper.GcsHelperException
        Creates a RemoteGcsHelper object. Project id and path to JSON key are read from two environment variables: GCLOUD_TESTS_PROJECT_ID and GCLOUD_TESTS_KEY.
        Parameters:
        options - creation options
        Returns:
        A RemoteGcsHelper object for the provided options.
        Throws:
        RemoteGcsHelper.GcsHelperException - if environment variables GCLOUD_TESTS_PROJECT_ID and GCLOUD_TESTS_KEY are not set or if the file pointed by GCLOUD_TESTS_KEY does not exist
